definition: to make one's home/to take shelter
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
settle down and get on with one's pursuit

sentences.english: This child never felt so well as when he was in the street.
sentences.chinese: 这孩子从来就只觉得街上才是他安身的地方。

sentences.english: Terrorists will not find a safe haven here.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子在这里将找不到安身之处。

sentences.english: When a man walks into a room, he brings his whole life with him.
sentences.chinese: 当一个男人选择安身立命，他背负着自己的一生。

sentences.english: Yet the networks of relationships in which firms are embedded profoundly influence their conduct and performance.
sentences.chinese: 企业安身立命的关系网却深刻地影响其行为与绩效。

sentences.english: Swallow poor lament only to find shelter in place everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的燕子只有在悲鸣中到处寻觅安身之地。

sentences.english: This town was originally settled by gold prospectors .
sentences.chinese: 此镇原为探金矿者安身之处。

sentences.english: And, from this condition, I try to find my bearings.
sentences.chinese: 从我自身的情况，我设法找到我的安身立命之道。

sentences.english: Or maybe I can keep the house so clean that there's nothing to keep it hanging around here.
sentences.chinese: 或许我可以保持房间整洁，让老鼠找不到安身之处。

sentences.english: They had to ask, very not easy to find a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 他们只好四处打听，好不容易才找到一个安身之处。

sentences.english: It can’t provide shelter, like a house.
sentences.chinese: 它不会给你提供安身之所，比如房子。

sentences.english: He is the pearl, the tides, clam no static shock safe haven in place.
sentences.chinese: 他海滨无珠者，潮汐震撼，蚌无安身静存之地也。

sentences.english: He afforded a temporary shelter for the needy.
sentences.chinese: 他为穷人提供暂时的安身之处。

sentences.english: And I'm here to warn you, Capricorn knows where you're staying.
sentences.chinese: 我来是警告你，摩羯知道你们的安身之处在哪。

sentences.english: But, as people living in the world, many worry in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在安身立命为人处世间，诸多烦恼纠缠于心。

sentences.english: The goddess are traveling looking for a resting place.
sentences.chinese: 这位女神四出旅行，寻找安身之处。

sentences.english: This lord went east and found safety.
sentences.chinese: 这位主人东去，找到了安身之所。

to settle down/to live peacefully
